subject: Doping (Sports)
Track and Field
Tests (Drug Use)
lead_paragraph: Vassilis Sevastis, the president of Greece’s track federation, said that the triple-jumper Hrysopiyi Devetzi had been barred for two years for failing to submit to a doping test in May 2009.
snippet: Vassilis Sevastis, the president of Greece’s track federation, said that the triple-jumper Hrysopiyi Devetzi had been barred for two years for failing to submit to a doping test in May 2009.
